name: Supabase
description: Supabase MCP integration for database operations, authentication, storage, and real-time subscriptions. Manage your Supabase projects, run SQL queries, and interact with your backend directly.
longDescription: Connects to Supabase's hosted MCP endpoint via HTTP at `mcp.supabase.com`. Run SQL queries, manage authentication users and policies, configure storage buckets, and set up real-time subscriptions from Claude Code. No local server to install -- authenticates through Supabase's connection flow.
